ability.Empathic Link: When this Pokemon takes damage from attacks at full HP, the opponent receives the same amount of damage.

Prismatic Beam.effect: Has a 20% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1 stage.

Fairy Glow.effect: Raises the user's Special Attack and Special Defense by 1 stage.

Psycho Shift.effect: Transfers the user's status condition to the target.
